alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 01 at 12:10PM MST until March 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...The Little Colorado River Valley and adjacent areas, including Tuba City, Winslow, Holbrook, Snowflake, Saint Johns, Springerville, Dilkon, Kykotsmovi. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing dust could reduce visibility. Snow showers are forecast to develop late Wednesday afternoon and overnight in these areas.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
